name: GameJam Submission -- The Teddy Invasion
description:
In our game our famous Teddy plays a huge role. He is more strict than you think so try to not touch him. 

Let's see what you can do in 1 min.

Thanks to Nagoya#4817 we have an updated version of our game with a new location setting :)

The Game: 

https://marie-outlaw.itch.io/gamejam-submission--the-teddy-invasion

The Rockstars: 

Marie🌸 | The NFT Show#5703 (Twitter: sevtam17): main developer of the game

Nagoya#4817: Second developer

Ly#7541 (Twitter: huongly_p): Support in creating a game idea, poster, research
